In order to help people, this application is free.\nIn order to make it lighter and usable by all Android devices, it\'s Ad free.\nYou can support the author of the application by making him a gift through Paypal :

Hi ! My name is Fabien \'Mithraw\' Moraldo, i\'m born in the 1985, and i like doing things, yeah, just like you ! We are so much the same !\nNo kidding, i\'m just a regular dude, who will be happy if you enjoyed his work.\nBut must of all, i would be nobody without my friends, so a big thanks to the friends who supported me, and helped me testing the app :

You are successfully connected to your google account
This application is open source and licenced under GPL3 you can find its source code here:
You can find it\'s privacy policy here :
Notify me to rate my day

1 - Select a date.
2 - Expand it in order to watch all your log and share it to your friends.
3 - Remove the day selected.
4 - Edit the day selected.

You can also swipe up to reset the date to today's date, swipe left and right to display or hide the menu, or swipe down to refresh the content of the day selected.
You can click on the menu in order to expand it.\nYou can click on the button in the top right corner in order to go back to today.
Then select an item in order to open the corresponding screen.
How to use the Main screen
How to use the Rating screen

The only mandatory action is to rate your day.

If you want to, you can fill the title an a text for your day.

You can add pictures and/or a location by clicking on the items on the bottom of the screen

To save your day and return to the main screen you can tap the save button on top or the back button of your phone.
How to use the Entry logs screen

On the top of the screen, you can select the bound of dates you want to display on the screen.\nBy clicking on a day of the week, you remove/display all the entries from the list that are corresponding the day you clicked
By tapping a day card, you display three buttons that allow you to take actions on the day, remove, edit or expand the day as you pleased.
How to use the Diagram screen
In the first diagram, you can select a start date and a end date : It will display the average rating of each day of the week on the time period you selected.

In the week diagrams, you can see the average rating of each day of the week on the time period displayed (this year, or all time).\nYou can tap on a diagram to show the actual value of each bar.\nYou can share the diagram with you friends by tapping on the share button.

In the month diagrams, you can see the average rating of each month on the time period displayed (this year, or all time).\nYou can tap on a diagram to show the actual value of each bar.\nYou can share the diagram with you friends by tapping on the share button.
How to use the Interesting data screen

Each card give you interesting statistics and ideas about what the application found out using your data.\nYou can tap on a card to display the share button, or close it to make it disappear for a month.
Carpe Diem, try to live every day like if it was the last ! (in the limit of the law of course !)
You are a kind of someone of extreme, maybe you should try to relativize, not everything is black or white.

There is a big gap between your {worst_day}s and your {best_day}s, maybe you should try to do more activities you like on {worst_day}, maybe go out with your friends, your family, or take some time for yourself to enjoy.

You are now back to today
You can retrieve all the data you entered in the application in different file formats :

You can import data in two formats :
 - CSV : "datetime in millisec";"rate";"title";"text"
 - Sqlite3 Database : same database that you did export on this screen.
In your texts, if you want any photo to be inside, you must insert [[[photoname.png]]]
You can send your photos they must be in a zip archive with a parent directory named \"images-day\" with directories inside it named by the date they fit in YYYYMMDD:
